title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.44 - Payments to the Agriculture and New York State Horse Breeding Development Fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.44 - Payments to the Agriculture and New York State Horse Breeding Development Fund

State Regulations

Every corporation or association shall pay to the

Agriculture and New York State Horse Breeding Development Fund the percentage
of the pari-mutuel pool as required by law when the payments of State taxes are
due to the State Tax Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
